mapper.sql: select t.TBL_ID,t.DB_ID,d.`NAME`,CONCAT(d.`NAME`,'.',t.TBL_NAME) as tbl_name,t.`OWNER` as create_by,FROM_UNIXTIME(t.CREATE_TIME) as create_time,PARAM_VALUE as tbl_comment from TBLS t inner join DBS d on t.DB_ID=d.DB_ID left join (select TBL_ID,PARAM_VALUE from TABLE_PARAMS where PARAM_KEY='comment') p on t.tbl_id = p.TBL_ID
